Title: Provides that a state employee's net salary may be deposited directly in a bank for any purpose to an account in the name of such employee
Summary: Provides that the comptroller shall cause, in accordance with the rules and regulations promulgated by the comptroller, that a state employee's net salary may be deposited directly in a bank for any purpose to an account in the name of such employee.
LawCode: Amd ยง200, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the direct deposit of certain salaries
